name: Ensure encrypted storage is used for VMs that might host a database
body:
If you have to or choose to host the database on a virtual machine, encrypting the volumes is highly recommended.

The system determines this based on the VM name.
remediationDescription: Consult the following [AWS article](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/security/architecting-for-database-encryption-on-aws/) describing various alternatives for database encryption.
